text: Alain Lewuillon (born 27 February 1953) is a Belgian rower. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Belgium Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ixelles
title: Alain Lewuillon
